data: Zwei alte Freunde begegnen sich nach Jahrzehnten wieder, doch ihr Aufeinandertreffen läuft anders als erwartet. Plötzlich geht es um Leben und Tod. (After the fall of the Berlin Wall, Hoffmann reached the peak of his popularity. The former front man of a GDR rock combo is suddenly accused by his former band colleague Hinze of being the "IM singer" who betrayed him to the Stasi.)
Zwei alte Freunde begegnen sich nach Jahrzehnten wieder, doch ihr Aufeinandertreffen läuft anders als erwartet. Plötzlich geht es um Leben und Tod.

After the fall of the Berlin Wall, Hoffmann reached the peak of his popularity. The former front man of a GDR rock combo is suddenly accused by his former band colleague Hinze of being the "IM singer" who betrayed him to the Stasi.
